name: Building Products Magazine
description:
Building Products is the leading monthly product based magazine aimed at specifiers working in private and public as well as the residential, commercial and industrial sectors of the UK construction industry.

Each issue highlights:
• Quality product news on all of the latest building innovations available to UK specifiers.
• In-depth analysis and comment on relevant building specification issues.
• Feature coverage on how construction products have been applied across a wide range of project types.
• Insights from specifiers on technical challenges and solutions.
• An extensive Showcase section of product guides, information packs, brochures and websites.

Building Products is the magazine of choice on product information for thousands of key decision makers working in the UK building industry.
